reviewText: This book will be a good reference to assist me in teaching others about the diet in my professional position.
Already losing weight and bp is coming down. Thanks
Have you seen the commercial on TV  this is all this DVD is the same thing...don't waste your money.
This DVD was very good, maybe even better than reading the book.  It seemed to explain the diet plan a little better than the book.
I have high blood pressure and DR recommended this diet.  I already knew the basics but I wanted more info.
I thought this was a book not a dvd so I was not impressed thanks anyway I will not recommend this to anyone
I enjoyed the video. It went into detail about the science of the diet. I liked Marla's meal plan suggestions.
